document.title: Georgia Standards of Excellence CTEA Marketing

0554247C47A84236804841DA5DD731D9.description: Explore the local, state, and national opportunities available to students through participation in DECA including but not limited to conferences, competitions, community service, philanthropy, and other DECA activities.
